Player History
Earned first career win on 4/9/1965...
Had first career hit on 4/28/1965, off Larry Sherry (LAN)...
Injured on 5/24/1965 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1965...
Traded from Atlanta to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1966 (Going to ATL: 2B J. Morgan, P C. Dobson. Going to CHC: P J. Lonborg)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1967, off Ray Sadecki (STL)...
Injured on 9/3/1968 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/1/1969 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/1973, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
Injured on 6/12/1973 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/1973 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Drafted in 6th round, 101st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1976...
Released by Philadelphia on 4/26/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 5/12/1979 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1980, off Stan Bahnsen (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/28/1981, off Don Sutton (OAK)...
Released by Texas on 11/3/1982...
